MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get (long[] dst);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get(int64[] dst) cil managed

Docs.param: the destination long array.
Docs.summary: Reads longs from the current position into the specified long array and increases the position by the number of longs read.
Docs.exception: if dst.length is greater than remaining().

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get (long[] dst, int dstOffset, int longCount);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get(int64[] dst, int32 dstOffset, int32 longCount) cil managed

Docs.param: the target long array.
the offset of the long array, must not be negative and not greater than dst.length.
the number of longs to read, must be no less than zero and not greater than dst.length - dstOffset.
Docs.summary: Reads longs from the current position into the specified long array, starting from the specified offset, and increase the position by the number of longs read.
Docs.exception: if either dstOffset or longCount is invalid.
if longCount is greater than remaining().

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put (Java.Nio.LongBuffer src);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put(class Java.Nio.LongBuffer src) cil managed

Docs.param: the source long buffer.
Docs.summary: Writes all the remaining longs of the src long buffer to this buffer's current position, and increases both buffers' position by the number of longs copied.
Docs.exception: if src.remaining() is greater than this buffer's remaining().
if src is this buffer.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

Docs.summary: Writes the given long to the current position and increases the position by 1.

if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put (long[] src);

Docs.param: the source long array.
Docs.summary: Writes longs from the given long array to the current position and increases the position by the number of longs written.
Docs.exception: if remaining() is less than src.length.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put (long[] src, int srcOffset, int longCount);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put(int64[] src, int32 srcOffset, int32 longCount) cil managed

Docs.param: the source long array.
the offset of long array, must not be negative and not greater than src.length.
the number of longs to write, must be no less than zero and not greater than src.length - srcOffset.
Docs.summary: Writes longs from the given long array, starting from the specified offset, to the current position and increases the position by the number of longs written.
Docs.exception: if remaining() is less than longCount.
if either srcOffset or longCount is invalid.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.
